Make sure your birth date and biological mother\'s name are filled in with the correct data because it is used as checking the similarity of data when forgetting your PIN.
*The password must be 8–20 characters long! Password is a combination of capital letters, lowercase letters and numbers.
Password must be consist of 8–20 characters!

Your Balance is a financial application with features social media. Because banking is a part of your social life.

License of Electronic Money Issuer and Legal Entity whom provides Digital Financial Service on November 3, 2020

License of Fund Transfer operator in order to provide fund transfer Features through Electronic Money on November 3, 2020

1. SALDOMU is only distributed through the Play Store and App Store by PT Mitra Pembayaran Elektronik.
2. Please DO NOT log in other media besides the official application to avoid any type of fraud in the name of SALDOMU.
3. If there are indications of fraud, please report to us via support@saldomu.com

PT. MITRA PEMBAYARAN ELEKTRONIK

Date of birth can’t exceed today’s date
Upcoming date can’t be less than today
Date of birth can’t be empty
Date of birth can’t be empty
* Make sure that the date of birth that you choose is in accordance with what is stated on your ID Card.
* Make sure that the email address listed is correct and active, because all your Saldomu transaction reports will be sent to that email address.
*Make sure that owner of account number entered is same with your Saldomu name.
*Make sure that the Recipient Name entered is correct..

Please come to the nearest Agent.
Thank you for downloading our application! Enjoy the features provided by SALDOMU.
Send money to fellow users, friends, communities whenever you want.
If saving is constrained by distance, come or look for SALDOMU agents around you. You can easily save money to the account you want to go.
A wide network of agents in the area and around you, cash withdrawals can be easier anywhere you want.
You also meet your daily needs such as buying credit, electricity tokens, installments and much more.
The PIN (Personal Identification Number) is used as an authorization when you do a transaction.
Your PIN is blocked. Use "Forgot Pin" to unblock.
Top Up Process takes max. 5 minutes.
Selfie with KTP Photo is required!
Enter the verification code sent to the email

1. Please always maintain the confidentiality of your PASSWORD, PIN and Verification code, and do not provide such data to anyone, including those on behalf of PT Mitra Pembayaran Elektronik or SALDOMU.
2. SALDOMU is only distributed through Google Play by PT Mitra Pembayaran Elektronik.
3. Please DO NOT log in any media other than the official application to avoid any type of fraud in the name of SALDOMU.
4. If there are indications of fraud, please report to us via support@saldomu.com
